additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sodium Palmate, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Water, Sorbitol, Glycerine, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Sodium Lauryl Sulphate, Sodium Chloride, Wheatgerm Oil, Titanium Dioxide, Palm Acid, Palm Kernel Acid, Etidronic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, immediately rinse with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use.

description: Sorbolene.Velvet Sorbolene Beauty Bars are specially formulated to gently cleanse and moisture even the most sensitive skin types.Extra gentle on skin.Dermatologically tested.Fragrance free.
name: Sorbolene Soap
